author: Scott Polacek
title: NFL, NFLPA Reportedly Agree to Voluntary Offseason Program, 'Virtual Period'
description: The  NFL  and the NFL Players Association have agreed to a voluntary offseason program that will begin next Monday...
content:
Ron Schwane/Associated Press
The NFL and the NFL Players Association have agreed to a voluntary offseason program that will begin next Monday.
Adam Schefter of ESPN shared part of the memo from the NFL Management Council outlining the guidelines, which stat… [+878 chars]
